001package imagingbook.lib.filter;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
004import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
005
006public abstract class GenericFilterScalar extends GenericFilter {
007        
008        // for progress reporting only
009        private int slice;
010        private int sliceMax = 1;
011        
012        private int iter;
013        private int iterMax = 1;
014        
015        // apply filter to a stack of pixel planes (1 pass)
016        @Override
017        protected void runPass(PixelPack source, PixelPack target) {
018                sliceMax = source.getDepth();
019                for (int k = 0; k < sliceMax; k++) {
020                        //IJ.log("+++++++ starting slice " + k);
021                        this.slice = k;
022                        runSlice(source.getSlice(k), target.getSlice(k));       // default behavior: apply filter to each plane, place results in target
023                }
024        }
025        
026        // a bit wasteful, as we provide a separate target for each plane
027        private void runSlice(PixelSlice sourcePlane, PixelSlice targetPlane) {
028                final int width = sourcePlane.getWidth();
029                final int height = sourcePlane.getHeight();
030                this.iterMax = width * height;
031                this.iter = 0;
032                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
033                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
034                                targetPlane.setVal(u, v, doPixel(sourcePlane, u, v));
035                                this.iter++;
036                        }
037                }
038                this.iter = 0;
039        }
040
041        // this method every scalar filter must implement
042        // calculate the result value for a single pixel
043        protected abstract float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v);
044        
045        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
046
047        @Override
048        protected final double reportProgress(double subProgress) {
049                double loopProgress = (this.iter + subProgress) / this.iterMax;
050                //IJ.log("   loopProgress = " + loopProgress);
051                double sliceProgress = (this.slice + loopProgress) / this.sliceMax;
052                //IJ.log("   sliceProgress = " + sliceProgress);
053                //System.out.println("reportProgress: GenericFilterScalar " + localProgress);
054                return super.reportProgress(sliceProgress);
055        }
056
057}
